definition: Wen'an county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei
language/culture/writing/formal/literary/gentle/(old) classifier for coins/Kangxi radical 67
surname Wen
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An
Wen'an county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei

sentences.english: Just when he thinks all hopes are dashed, Wen An appears.
sentences.chinese: 在他最沮喪的時候，文安出現了。

sentences.english: At least two petroleum systems occur in the Wen'an oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，文安油田至少存在兩個油氣富集體系。

sentences.english: Besides being able to see Zhang Yang, Wen An can also communicate with him.
sentences.chinese: 文安不只能看到張揚，還可以跟他溝通。

sentences.english: The magazine has gained immediate nationwide popularity at once as it is interesting and easy.
sentences.chinese: 這份雜誌內容有趣，文安淺顯，立即暢銷全國。

sentences.english: The software has already been used in Wen'an county.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已經應用於文安縣多個林場。

sentences.english: Wen An tries to leave his mobile phone at the Zhangs but gets found out.
sentences.chinese: 文安到張家藉故留下手機，卻被發現。
